Description: IAM Policy for S3 Backup Access. Attach this policy to an IAM user or role used for database backups. Replace 'your-freemarket-backups' with your actual bucket name.

SecurityBestPractices: Use IAM roles instead of access keys when possible
Enable MFA for the IAM user
Configure S3 lifecycle policies for automatic cleanup
ExampleCLICommands: aws iam put-user-policy --user-name freemarket-backup --policy-name S3BackupPolicy --policy-document file://s3_backup_policy.json
